original: a'arya pra t'i tya sa mutp'a da hri da ya n'a ma /
analyzed: a'arya pra t'i tya sa mutp'a da hri da ya n'a ma /

original: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba /

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha, the Blessed One.

original: chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi /
analyzed: chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi /
translated: Those things that arise from causes,

original: rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa //
analyzed: rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa //

original: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te //

original: dge sbyong chen po 'di skad gsungs @325a *//
analyzed: dge sbyong chen po 'di skad gsungs @325a *//
translated: The great ascetic has spoken thus.

original: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba dat /
analyzed: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba dat /
translated: Ye dharmā hetu prabhavā hetun teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat

original: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam b'a d'i ma h'a shra ma na:/
analyzed: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam b'a d'i ma h'a shra ma na:/
translated: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ.

original: snying po 'di lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro; ;mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi zhing zlog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying po 'di lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro; ;mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi zhing zlog par 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting this essence once, all misdeeds will be purified. All unfavorable conditions will be pacified and averted.

original: dngos po gang la dmigs te brjod na /🔽sangs rgyas kyi sku'am /
analyzed: dngos po gang la dmigs te brjod na / sangs rgyas kyi sku'am /
translated: If one recites this while visualizing any object,🔽it will become the Buddha's body

original: mchod pa gang la dmigs te brjod na /
analyzed: mchod pa gang la dmigs te brjod na /
translated: If you offer this to whom?

original: 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam phul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam phul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It is as if you were to offer as many universes as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying bo rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying bo rdzogs so ////
translated: The Heart of Interdependent Origination is complete.
